hero_image.alt: Hero image for Hot Works Permit Requirements Queensland: The Definitive Compliance & Digital Workflow Guide (2026)

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality hero image inside a modern industrial manufacturing facility in Queensland. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians and a safety officer are conducting a pre-work briefing. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses. One technician is holding a tablet (back of device visible only) showing a digital checklist. In the background, out of focus, is heavy machinery and yellow safety barriers. The lighting is professional and bright, highlighting a culture of safety and technology. No text or words should be visible in the image.
